Title: Instemote
Description: Instemote is a free and open source Insteon home lighting control system remote for Windows Phone and Windows!
HomeWiki:
Instemote is a free and open source Insteon client for Windows Phone and Windows.

Features
  • Cortana Integration
  • Roaming Data
  • Geo Fence light control
  • Fast and easy to use!
  • More soon!

This is my first attempt at a universal app; I hope this project can serve as a simple reference for Windows Phone 8.1 features.
